mechanics.title: How to Place, Select, and Delete Pieces

placing.title: Placing a Piece:
placing.step1: 1. Click on an empty cell in the container to start drawing.
placing.step2: 2. Continue clicking adjacent cells to define the shape.
placing.step3: 3. The system will automatically match your drawn shape to a valid piece and place it.

selecting.title: Selecting a Piece:

deleting.alternative: ‚Äì Or: Select the piece (single-click), then click the delete/trash button.
deleting.reminder: ‚Äì Remember: Deleting a piece uses your turn but gives no points.
